Topic.Title: How to Convert Quest Game to Android?

Posts.EditableText: How do I convert a Quest Game to Android if I want to play it on the platform?
Posts.HTML: How do I convert a Quest Game to Android if I want to play it on the platform?

Posts.EditableText: Use QuestJS https://github.com/textadventures/quest-js Then wrap the result using PhoneGap https://build.phonegap.com/
Posts.HTML:
Use QuestJS https://github.com/textadventures/quest-js

Then wrap the result using PhoneGap https://build.phonegap.com/

Also, I can click on the item to get a drop down menu to selct "Take", "Drop", etc...but after converting to the apk with phonegap build, the menu option does not work. Is this something that is not available at this time or is there something I need to do to get it working? Thank you.
